metadata.title: CVE-2020-12797 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
HashiCorp Consul and Consul Enterprise failed to enforce changes to legacyACL token rules due to non-propagation to secondary data centers.Introduced in 1.4.0, fixed in 1.6.6 and 1.7.4.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12797` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

consul - 1.10.12+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: consul package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.12+dfsg1-1').
